Control.Text: Data Text settings do not transfer
Control.Name: Notice
NewProfile
Control.Tooltip: To create a new profile, type the desired name into the input box and press return.

Control.Name: Current
Control.Tooltip: Here you can select which profile you would like to use.

Control.Name: Copy
Control.Tooltip: Here you can import the settings from another profile into your current one.

Control.Name: Delete
Control.Tooltip: If you do not want a certain profile anymore you can delete it here.
